name: suction-cups
caption: Suction Cups

effect.short: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.
effect.full:
This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by moves such as []{move:whirlwind}.

[]{move:dragon-tail} and []{move:circle-throw} still inflict damage against this Pokémon.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the success rate while fishing is increased.

flavorText:
This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot
to negate all moves and items that force
switching out.
